sentence.text: His facial features included a high anterior hairline, small eyes with narrowed palpebral fissures, a bulbous nasal biological_process with a short columella, and a large mouth with a thin upper vermilion, and small chin.

De novo missense and frameshift mutations and deletions involving negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II have been described in patients with intellectual disability and autism, but without any of the dysmorphic findings or malformations associated with Pierpont syndrome, implying a mutation-specific mechanism for the pathogenicity of p.Tyr446Cys.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: His distinctive facial and digital features are further evidence that p.Tyr446Cys results in a clinically recognizable, syndromic form of intellectual disability in contrast to other negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II mutations

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
